text: Requiem for a Dream is a 2000 American psychological drama movie. It was directed by Darren Aronofsky. It stars Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, and Marlon Wayans. The movie is about people with different drug addictions in Brooklyn, New York City. == Cast == *Ellen Burstyn as Sara Goldfarb *Jared Leto as Harry Goldfarb *Jennifer Connelly as Marion Silver *Marlon Wayans as Tyrone C. Love *Keith David as Big Tim == Other websites == * Category:2000 drama movies Category:2000s psychological movies Category:American drama movies Category:American psychological movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies directed by Darren Aronofsky Category:Movies set in Brooklyn Category:Movies set in New York City Category:American independent movies
title: Requiem for a Dream
